annotation.spannedText: Decreased vaccine coverage is still a major concern in Texas

classMention.mentionClass: Decreased vaccine coverage is still a major concern in Texas

annotation.spannedText: even though the mumps vaccine is less effective than the shot for measles or rubella, people who receive even one dose of the mumps vaccine are less likely to have severe complications if they contract the disease.

classMention.mentionClass: even though the mumps vaccine is less effective than the shot for measles or rubella, people who receive even one dose of the mumps vaccine are less likely to have severe complications if they contract the disease.
